query:
SELECT buildPhase, resourceType, description, orderQuantity, cost 
FROM jobResources 
WHERE jobId = 330001 AND buildPhase = 'Carpentry' 
ORDER BY resourceType, description 
LIMIT 20;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 22jfyN8cyREv1iY.43376d1ea5ce --database 7pDSPyD4eqm3QYRLLEkhfC --execute SELECT buildPhase, resourceType, description, orderQuantity, cost 
FROM jobResources 
WHERE jobId = 330001 AND buildPhase = 'Carpentry' 
ORDER BY resourceType, description 
LIMIT 20;
